skills.name: Sequential Attack
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 3 times with each strike having a 30% chance to decrease the target's Defense for 2 turns.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Dragon's Dance
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 3 times with each strike having a 15% chance to remove a beneficial effect and stuns them for 1 turn. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark> + 0.07*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Strong Energy (Passive)
skills.description: The effect of all Attack Bar increasing skills of both allies and enemies will be decreased by 50%. Your Attack Bar will increase by 20% whenever an enemy uses an Attack Bar increasing skill. This skill will not apply to an opponent that has the same skill or Boss skills.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.
